context.title: Changelog for Rule: `video` element visual content has accessible alternative
context.changelog: [{"commit":"4e85f969664aa3439075967c481db6bfc1ea86c6","msg":"Updating rule name(s) and filename(s) (#943)","date":"1569413997"},{"commit":"fef49b730189c2ab6860fbcaa36641016d11e328","msg":"Make all test asset paths root relative (#887)","date":"1568700536"},{"commit":"3c081053825819f44ecec129e4d835b16c71db4d","msg":"Add many missing links to glossary (#695)","date":"1567495802"},{"commit":"e87fa0696963a2a7f950b35712cc93d9afb56dd7","msg":"fix: update links to WCAG21 resources (#776)","date":"1566375576"},{"commit":"71af6a0dfa82898888bcba743e9d1c700bdf92b8","msg":"Editorial changes (#725)","date":"1566371604"},{"commit":"e29f1e1bddd9650989b33676c19c238653def4fe","msg":"fix: update test assets being referred for media rules (f51b46,… (#731)","date":"1565691182"},{"commit":"210e36973c94dfd59c7079c6fafa6a201ce6b0bc","msg":"Editorial changes (#702)","date":"1564147075"},{"commit":"12d14a9acaa5c5e403fe96f7ec14a8b12a3d2b13","msg":"fix: test if definition for  all referenced glossary terms exist (#634)","date":"1563353169"},{"commit":"c13376dd1d7241b47083e349e7b53aae4e1ab9ac","msg":"Composite rules: Fix broken links in expectations (#627)","date":"1562078377"},{"commit":"16cde87954951ec8da9d983f468cd0b798c5878c","msg":"Template update - video with audio has audio descriptions or transcript (#530)","date":"1557261586"},{"commit":"c5eccb6724f0f196f8359c0070148033f2f3b894","msg":"fix: hyperlink to video description track rule (#426)","date":"1551620102"},{"commit":"604b1722e9350c21c1e16035629304791a28b600","msg":"rule: SC 1.2.3 & 1.2.5 Video alternatives (#204)","date":"1548148952"}]
context.fastmatterAttributes: {"id":"c5a4ea","name":"`video` element visual content has accessible alternative","rule_type":"composite","description":"This rule checks that `video` elements with audio have an alternative for the video content as audio or as text.\n","accessibility_requirements":{"wcag20:1.2.3":{"forConformance":true,"failed":"not satisfied","passed":"further testing needed","inapplicable":"further testing needed"}},"input_rules":["1ea59c","1a02b0","f196ce","ab4d13"],"authors":["Wilco Fiers","Brian Bors"]}
